name: The fallen (itch) (SuperBlooper)
description:
While it just started as a simple dungeon crawler prototype made in a couple days I have decided to expand upon it.

The general idea of the game once I actually have it fleshed out will be that you go and find creatures within the world and using your advanced knowledge being a crash landed space fairer train and strengthen the creatures that aid you in all manner of ways to fend off the eldritch forces that have placed themselves against you.

Currently though it's still in that prototype-esque phase of development.

the controls are simple, left click to swing your sword, wasd to move.
the yellow balls in the dungeon are food, the corresponding yellow bar is your hunger, neglect it and you will die.
red triangles are for health, use it to heal yourself.
The blue cube is where you spawn each floor.
The green one is the exit of the floor, it will bring you to the next floor.
Press Escape to access the menu.

There's a special win screen at 50 floors,  be warned, the only part of the game with audio so.
